name: Ignacio Paradisi
title: Staff Software Engineer
profile: Skilled Staff Software Engineer with six years of extensive experience in iOS development utilizing Swift and SwiftUI, employing recognized architectural patterns such as Clean Architecture, MVVM, MVC, and TDD. My technical palette also extends to cross-platform application development using Flutter with adept state management practices, showcasing my versatility in handling a wide range of software projects.

With a solid foundation in consuming REST and GraphQL services, I excel in integrating these technologies to create robust, user-friendly applications. My keen eye for design and a strong emphasis on delivering exceptional user experiences drive my dedication to producing high-quality, aesthetically pleasing products.

I thrive in collaborative environments and am deeply committed to contributing my comprehensive background in both native and cross-platform mobile application development, along with my passion for clean, well-architected code, to a progressive organization that values innovation and quality.

experience.title: Staff Software Engineer
experience.description: Spearheaded the development of a Flutter app from scratch, designed to render a server-driven UI. This enabled users to craft a flow on a webpage and seamlessly utilize it within the app. By employing reusable components alongside MVVM, Clean Architecture and GraphQL, I ensured a well-structured and maintainable codebase. Additionally, I integrated a feature to handle events based on user configurations on the webpage, enhancing the app's responsiveness and user-centric functionality.

experience.title: Engineering Lead
experience.description: Established a close collaboration with the product and the developer teams, acting as a bridge to ensure clear communication and alignment on goals. My leadership role entailed managing the developer team, assigning tasks, resolving concerns, and crafting effective solutions to meet project objectives. A significant milestone during my tenure was leading the successful migration of an entire app from iOS to Android.

experience.title: iOS Developer
experience.description: As one of the pioneering iOS Developers at Kavak, I played a pivotal role in laying the foundation of the mobile application landscape within the organization. My contributions spanned from developing several internal applications to engaging in backend development, thereby enhancing our in-house software ecosystem. There was a shift from REST to GraphQL and I actively contributed to adapting the app architecture to ensure seamless support for both protocols during the migration.

experience.title: iOS Developer
experience.description: Contributed to the development of Pictune, an app that uniquely blends music with images. One of my tasks was to devise an emoji keyboard with a select set of emojis, facilitating users in composing music. The app utilized a machine learning model to harmonize the selected emojis and imagery into music. Additionally, I introduced a 'like' feature to enhance user interaction. I also made the migration of the app from Swift 3 to Swift 4, ensuring the app stayed updated with the latest coding standards, thereby enhancing its performance and maintainability.
